name: cloudflare-typescript-workers
description: A tested Hello World Cloudflare Worker written in TypeScript

scripts.packages: cd packages/@udacity/cloudflare-worker-mock;cp -R ../../../node_modules .;npm run prepublish;cd ../types-cloudflare-worker;npm run prepublish;cd ../types-service-worker-mock;npm run prepublish;
scripts.build: webpack --progress --mode production # Create minified output, runs in Cloudflare
scripts.build-dev: webpack --progress --mode none # Creates readable output, runs in Cloudflare
scripts.test-all: npm run packages; npm run lint; jest; npm run test-demo;
scripts.test-demo: cp src/* demo/src/;cp test/* demo/test/;cd demo;jest
scripts.lint: tslint --project tsconfig.json packages/*/*.ts packages/*/*.d.ts src/*.ts test/*.ts

author: Brad Erickson <bderickson@gmail.com>
